website_summaries.verdict: Sharp's Aquos LE650U series offers reasonably priced LED-backlit HDTV with a generous feature set and an overall sharp picture. Color accuracy and viewing angle performance could be better, though.

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV, decent value
customer_reviews.text: good, clear picture. The default color saturation is way over the top, so it takes some time to find a balance that works. Plenty of HDMI inputs, but one thing I don't like - it doesn't have a optical audio output, it does have a digital audio output, but it's not an optical connection. I like the built in Netflix application - I was hoping to see a built in Amazon prime at some point
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Takes time to get right
customer_reviews.text: Although the picture is great I have had to spend way too much time on the phone with Sharp customer service to help with issues. I also had repairman come to the house who setup netflix on my sons wii I can't get it work directly through the tv. Not sure if you can have it both ways but it would be nice
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Bayer

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Having a few issues connecting to my Bose Suround had to order cables and adapter for surround sound. Good picture quality and fairly easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: MR RR MCNAB

customer_reviews.title: The best in this size range
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, Sharp is the best brand. Why do other brands need so many different, barely-distinguishable versions of the same size television anyway? Simple... so they can make some poorer quality or with marginally-different features. Picture is crystal clear, and I love the small border around the screen. Does everything I wanted and then some. VERY SATISFIED.
customer_reviews.author: J. Macmaniman

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Smart TV for a Smart Price!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the quality of this TV. The picture is amazing and has a good sound system already built in. I really like the Netflix app that the smart system featutes. I wish there were a wider range of apps for the Smart system, but besides that I love it! I would recommend this to anyone wanting a reasonably priced Smart TV.
customer_reviews.author: Megaan Pelaar

customer_reviews.title: Constant restarts and now dead
customer_reviews.text: This TV has good screen but sadly it is plagued with constant restarts. The TV just restarts for no reason randomly. I don't watch TV a lot and never bothered to claim warranty repair on it. From what I see based on reviews it would not have helped either. The TV is now dead less than two years after having been bought, it just died while watching a movie and has remained dead. I tried reset but it doesn't seem to help. Let's see if the SquareTrade warranty on this is any good.
customer_reviews.author: gadget_freak

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous TV! Clear, bright and easy to navigate and use! Will be buying another one for sure! Would certainly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Byard

customer_reviews.title: Great tv
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed this product. I haven't used many of the smart tv functions other than Netflix. It has performed very well. I have noticed a bit of stuttering when playing blu ray content from my media PC however that might be the computer not the tv. I haven't played anything off my actual blu ray player.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great TV Quality, Good Features
customer_reviews.text: We've had no problem with this TV. Screen is bright and images are sharp. Volume/Sound from the TV could be better, but most plug their TV into a sound system. Remote is well featured. One annoyance is the need to cycle through a large number of inputs to get back to desired input. There should be quick buttons for inputs.
customer_reviews.author: JD R

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I already had the 70" version in the same product family. The 50" is just as good... great picture and good controls. I just setup some excellent sounding external speakers, as I am using this TV in my office. Good sound really adds to the experience. Nicely done Sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Gene K.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Price, a no frills smart TV that is obsolete at this point.
customer_reviews.text: Great TV for the price. The SmartCentral offerings of Netflix, Vudu, or CinemaNow is pathetic and stays pathetic as Sharp offers no firmware upgrades for this set. It is was it is and will stay that way. If you want more services like Hulu or Amazon Prime videos, you will need to buy another set or use your PS3, Blu-Ray, etc... Picture and set up are OK. Sound for me is an issue. Even when using external soundbar you can't get much of a loud volume output to come out of this set.
customer_reviews.author: Drweb

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture but could be better in some areas
customer_reviews.text: Not very good for gaming on, there is some screen latency, even though it says it is on 120hz, it is not. The App does not work for this tv. (on iPhone 5 and up) Could be better for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Da Logs Man

customer_reviews.title: go bigger
customer_reviews.text: Love it - should've gotten the 60". With the very thin border, a bigger size will fit nicely in even a small living room
customer_reviews.author: MightyEva

customer_reviews.title: Aquos has beautiful color.
customer_reviews.text: My first wide screen TV was set up by the shipping service, who waited to confirm TV was operating as it should. After 20 minutes learning the remote and making picture settings recommended by CNET, I was enjoying this terrific TV experience. Enjoying football and movies, even High Definition News reports. After a good month, I have had a 100% positive experience. Have not attempted the wireless internet aspect yet, but I look forward to the smart part of this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S.

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Aquos not the Sharp of old.
customer_reviews.text: The TV stand was very wobbly, the color was very hard to adjust and the sound was like it came out of tin can. The sound system was the worst! I returned the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Young

customer_reviews.title: Looks So Real!
customer_reviews.text: The picture is so clear, sometimes movies look like they're too real!. I love the picture, quality and color. Very slim frame, looks great in a modern environment.
customer_reviews.author: Notable

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: The TV is great and all it has to offer. I just wish it had an audio digital out. I like that it does not get hot like my other flat screens. You wont be disappointed with this TV. It`s worth the money
customer_reviews.author: mike hoddy

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a 50 inch TV that will be strictly used for programming and not gamesI did not care about Smart nor 3D, so anyone out there who thinks the same should consider the Sharp models. I bought this at Sears for $584 on March 14 2014. Obviously for the price I am very happy, but thus far the performance is fantastic. The picture is great. This model is being phased out so if you find one, NEGOTIATE!
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Simons

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Smart HDTV Reboot Problem
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the 50" Sharp Smart HDTV is May 2013. The HDTV randomly reboots while watching programs. At first I thought it was a cable box problem. After replacing 3 boxes over 3 months I finally realized it was a TV problem. Contacted Sharp regarding the problem. Sharp service department had a repair service pick up the TV from my house. After 3 weeks the TV was still not repaired. Control board is on back order with no ETA. Bad luck with TV and repair. This will be the last Sharp product that I will purchase. Beware..
customer_reviews.author: R. Jager

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Sharp LC-50LE650 50-Inch Aquos 1080p 120Hz. it.constantly restarts by itself., Sounds like Sharp doesn't care if we stop purchasing their TV's. Great picture and features but you will not be happy with Sharp if you experience the power issue that seems to happen with many of their TV's.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after less than 4 years.
customer_reviews.text: What can possibly go wrong with electronics that it would stop working in less than 4 years. Needless to say, we won't be buying any more Sharp products ever again. These are much to expensive to have to replace every 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Freestream

customer_reviews.title: Dont Buy Sharp
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and shop around before settling for a Sharp television. The quality is subpar to ALL other brands available. The customer care department is despicable. Avoid the run around! Avoid the headaches! Anything but a Sharp!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: kenneth oehmke

customer_reviews.title: Awsome TV
customer_reviews.text: This television has just the right amount of visible screen and is slim to fit pretty much anywhere. I highly recommend putting the television on a wall mount.
customer_reviews.author: John Delsanto

customer_reviews.title: too bad.
customer_reviews.text: this tv is allweys burning the led strips and sharp dos not sel this part they seit is part of the panel assy. too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel P Mendez

product_meta.title: Sharp LC-50LE650 50-Inch Aquos 1080p 120Hz Smart LED TV (2014 Model)
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER



When choosing a large screen TV, look for what the experts look for. The Top Rated LC-50LE650U delivers legendary AQUOS picture quality and unlimited content choices, seamless control, and instant connectivity with a slim, stylish design. Conventional Pixel StructureAQUOS Pixel Structure



The Top Rated AQUOS LC-50LE650U deliver better overall picture quality using a unique precision pixel structure for:

• A 20% brighter picture
• Deeper black levels
• 4x the contrast ratio of competing LED TVs

The result is more accurate colors and higher quality images.




Access popular web apps and stream TV, movies and music. Browse the Web. Share content from your smartphone or tablet. 

SPLIT SCREEN 
Exclusive split screen feature lets you watch TV and browse at the same time 

BEAM

REMOTE CONTROL

3.3 out of 5 stars3.3 out of 533 customer ratings 5 star 30% 4 star 20% 3 star 17% 2 star 16% 1 star 17% How are ratings calculated?To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzes reviews to verify trustworthiness. 





Top reviews Most recent Top reviews THERE WAS A PROBLEM FILTERING REVIEWS RIGHT NOW. PLEASE TRY AGAIN LATER.
Anthony5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent TVReviewed in the United States on October 27, 2014Verified Purchase Definitely an amazing TV for the price. I use this primarily for gaming and web browsing as I have my computer hooked to my TV. This TV does have a true 120hz display which makes it perfect for PC gaming above 60 hz. At 60 hz you need to edit the HDMI setting in the input settings category as auto and video produce major input lag. Speaking of, I am able to downsample using my PC the display will handle a resolution of 2880x1620 and if you can manage to run games at that resolution they are absolutely gorgeous. This TV has excellent picture quality and fairly accurate color representation, will definitely be buying another TV from sharp when it's time to upgrade.Read more One person found this helpful Helpful Comment Report abuse Tony4.0 out of 5 stars Nice TV, decent valueReviewed in the United States on January 24, 2014Verified Purchase good, clear picture. feature_bullets: AQUOS 1080p LED Display: Using photo-alignment technology that's precision crafted to let more light through in bright scenes and shut more light out in dark scenes, the AQUOS 1080p LED Display with a 4 million: 1 contrast ratio creates a picture so real you can see the difference.

SmartCentral Smart TV with Dual-Core Processor & built in Wi-Fi: Sharp's intuitive Smart TV lets you quickly connect to your favorite content and instantly access apps like Facebook, Twitter, and YouTube, plus streaming movies, music, games, and websites you love.
Slim Design: The brilliant AQUOS LED display is embraced by a striking new frame that's thinner around the screen and slimmer in depth, so it can fit just about anywhere.
Powerful 20W Audio: High fidelity audio with Clear Voice technology.
TV without stand (Width x Height x Depth): 44-3/8" x 25-7/8" x 11-1/32", TV with stand (Width x Height x Depth): 44-3/8" x 25-1/4" x 1-3/4"
120Hz Refresh Rate: See sharper, more electrifying action with the most advanced panel refresh rates available today. 120Hz technology delivers crystal-clear images even during fast-motion scenes.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars33 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
